explains: adj. 青少年的，未成年的；少年犯的；幼稚的，孩子气的；（鸟或动物）幼年的
n. 青少年，未成年人；扮演青少年角色的演员；幼鸟，幼兽
wordGroup: juvenile delinquency 少年违法犯罪
juvenile court n. 少年法庭
juvenile diabetes 青少年糖尿病；幼年型糖尿病

sentences.en: Juvenile crime is increasing at a terrifying rate.
sentences.cn: 青少年犯罪在以惊人的速度增加。

sentences.en: She wasn't sent to the juvenile court; instead she was cautioned.
sentences.cn: 她未被送上少年法庭，而是受到了警告。

sentences.en: Fifteen-year-old Danny is on the run from a juvenile detention centre.
sentences.cn: 15岁的丹尼从少年犯拘留所逃了出来。
